values: Supervisors continuously monitor Soldiers for hot weather injuries and water. Training area has ample water refill sites. Soldiers given safety brief on weather.
Safety Brief, PCCs/PCI's, Leaders continuously monitor Soldiers
OIC, RSOs, NCOs, Soldiers
Soldiers have packed for appropriate weather contingencies. Soldiers continuously hydrate. Strykers used as warming areas if necessary.

Ensure Soldiers understand the boundaries of training area, starting point, Lost Soldier SOP, and Panic Azimuths. Roving Patrols on exterior of the training area and lane safeties on the course.

OIC, Safeties, Soldiers
